text: Ida is a 2013 Polish Danish French British drama movie directed by Paweł Pawlikowski and starring Agata Kulesza, Agata Trzebuchowska, Dawid Ogrodnik, Jerzy Trela. It was distributed by Solopan and was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2015. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paweł Pawlikowski Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in Poland
title: Ida (movie)
